entry.title: Cars sellers photo helper
entry.content:
This is something interesting to leverage time and money for nothnig during photo shots of your old fashioned stylish car.

I’ve imagine something like tubular spherical cunstruction with tiny motorized drive unit with stepper motor and wifi module to take shots from GoPro / any other camera from different angles. And this will help you to take photos from top spot points and other places, whis is not accessible during your stand near car.

Another solution - creage custom software for drone, which can apply focing data to camera and take shots on the fly.

entry.title: Idea: Automatic plains spotter
entry.content:
And this blog will contain ideas for future projects. Or somethnig similar.

One of them - automatic photo/video camera for plain spotters on the site of Airport with plane type / date of arrival and intellectual camera tergeting system to follow plane during landing / take off.

entry.title: Time to rewamp this into something new...
entry.content:
So it is more than one year go from time I get lost in my dreams about great remote job. And today I decide to cleanup this debris and create on top of it something new.

Dunno what it will be, but, for now, I have a job, I have something to eat and my mind still in great condition! New ideas? New themes? New crazy things? Aww yeah, and I like this.
